title: LIC's April premium hits decade high of Rs 12,384 cr
description: LIC's April premium collection of Rs 12,384 crore, highest since 2014, marked 113.14% growth from the previous year. Success attributed to marketing strategies, wider reach, policy uptake, reliability, and customer services.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
